Package ss.pentago.network

Class NetworkFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • ss.pentago.network.NetworkFactory
  • public class NetworkFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Factory class to generate all Client/Server related objects.

    • Method Detail

      • makeOnlineClientWithTUI

        public static OnlineClient makeOnlineClientWithTUI​(Player player)
        Create a new OnlineClient with specified Player. The OnlineClient allows connecting to a Server to play games against other OnlineClients.
        Parameters:
        player - the player to use for setting the username and to call its hint AI
        Returns:
        a new TUI-integrated OnlineClient

      • makeOfflineClientWithTUI

        public static OfflineClient makeOfflineClientWithTUI​(Player player1,
                                                     Player player2,
                                                     boolean shuffle)
        Create a new OfflineClient with specified Player objects. The OfflineClient runs a local game between two human or AI players.
        Parameters:
        player1 - the first player
        player2 - the second player
        shuffle - whether to use a random starting order
        Returns:
        a new TUI-integrated OfflineClient

      • makeServerWithTUI

        public static Server makeServerWithTUI()
        Create a new Server.
        Returns:
        a new TUI-integrated Server
